comments:
build i1129.

Potentially related to/duplicate of bug 162388.

Referenced JUnit bundles are available in bug 165356 attachment 55335. 

- extract Eclipse zip
- create a new version of org.junit which has the contents of org.junit4
- change org.junit4 so it is empty and imports org.junit and re-exports it
- create new plug-in project with a class and a method
- create new plug-in project which imports org.junit and contains a test case
- create a new JUnit4 Launch configuration for your class

I got the following in my error log:
